name: claude-manager
description: Terminal app for managing Claude Code settings, profiles, MCP servers, and skills

scripts.build: esbuild src/cli.js --platform=node --format=esm --loader:.js=jsx --bundle --outfile=dist/cli.js --packages=external && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/cli.js > dist/tmp && mv dist/tmp dist/cli.js && chmod +x dist/cli.js

author: Faisal Nazir
